self_reflections: To set a timer for 10 minutes, I need to access the Timer function within the Clock app. Since "Timer" is visible among the UI elements, clicking on it will take me to the timer interface where I can set the desired 10-minute duration.
To set a timer for 10 minutes, I first need to access the time setting interface. The "Set time" button will allow me to specify the desired duration of 10 minutes before starting the timer.
